index.title: Sebastiano Racca - Developer
index.description: Welcome to Sebastiano Racca's portfolio website, showcasing my passion for informatics and the world. Explore my projects and get in touch with me.

content.title: Based in italy
content.content: I am an italian student, pursuing my education and constantly seeking knowledge and personal growth in various fields.

content.title: PHP Developer
content.content: As a skilled PHP developer, I specialize in creating web applications and websites. Additionally, I have expertise in developing Telegram bots.

content.title: Scout Enthusiast
content.content: Being a scout is an integral part of my life. It has shaped my character, taught me valuable life skills, and allowed me to contribute to my community through teamwork, leadership, and outdoor activities.

content.title: Advocate for Equal Rights
content.content: I am deeply interested in social issues, particularly those related to ecology, ethnic diversity, and political minorities. I actively support initiatives that aim to create a more inclusive and sustainable world.

contacts.title: Contact Me
contacts.description: Get in touch with Sebastiano Racca and connect directly for inquiries, collaborations, or any questions you may have. Reach out to discuss projects, partnerships, or opportunities.

message.label: Message
message.placeholder: The message you want to send

projects.title: Open Source Projects
projects.description: Explore Sebastiano Racca's open source projects from GitHub, ranging libraries to full projects.

pay.title: Support Open Source: Donate or Hire for Services
pay.description: Explore multiple avenues to support my open-source endeavors - from contributing to my projects through donations to availing my professional services. Your contributions empower the growth of these projects and allow for continued innovation.

content.title: Support Me
content.bmc: So tired, why don't you buy me a coffee?
